text: Adewale Wally Adeyemo (born May 20, 1981) is a Nigerian-American lawyer and government worker, he served as the United States deputy secretary of the treasury. He was also the number one president of the Obama Foundation. He served during the Obama government as the deputy national security advisor for international economics. == References == Category:People from Ibadan Category:1981 births
title: Wally Adeyemo
